overview: From 2025-07-25 to 2025-07-26, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 1 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Complete Geth v1.16.1 Merge
topIssues.author: mslipper
topIssues.body:
Complete the Geth v1.16.1 merge.

Open PRs:

topPRs.title: feat(op-acceptance-tests): add more sysgo tests.
topPRs.author: scharissis
topPRs.body: Adds a lot more sysgo tests (all of them)! This is as part of the effort to unify all acceptance tests into the one workflow in CI.

topContributors.summary: scharissis: Focused on enhancing testing infrastructure by opening a new feature PR, ethereum-optimism/optimism#16817, to add more system go tests.
mslipper: Focused on infrastructure updates, creating an issue to track the Geth v1.16.1 Merge in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#16825).
